name: Fruit Catcher (ME)
description:
Welcome to 'Fruit Catcher'! In this fun and addictive game, your goal is to catch as many fruits as possible before you run out of lives. Move your basket left and right to catch the falling fruits and score points for every fruit you catch. But be careful not to miss any, as that will cause you to lose a life. How many fruits can you catch before the game ends?

'Fruit Catcher' is a simple yet entertaining game that's perfect for a quick break or a longer gaming session.

So what are you waiting for? Put your catching skills to the test and play 'Fruit Catcher' now!
